item.title: Delta ::staffmeeting command
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting") && playerRights >= 3) {//use ::staffmeeting in the server for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client c = (client) p; if (c.playerRights >= 1) {//teleting all mods+ to you c.toX = absX;//your x coords c.toY = absY;//your y coords c.sM("@red@Staff meeting: @bla@you have all been teleported to @mag@"+playerName+".");//message for the ppl who got teleported } } } }

add this into your client.java to all your other commands like (::home or ::maxhit or ::yell)

Read full topic
